I woke up to the sound of the dripping water. I looked around, very slowly...and saw sniper28 running towards the toilet clutching his anus because he had eaten curry; the super deluxe special curry that the zombies made themselves using their own rotten limbs, torn off during Reaj 's attack in the town of London.

A hopskip and several flushes later, the curry attack has finally ended. But the relief was short-lived because I ate some chilli pepper. And that ended the story Of how I got explosive diarrhea on my twentieth birthday. In other news, the town my friend sniper28 was in started preparing for the coming depression, in which the price of water skyrocketed beyond belief, because some Griefer built the paper boat without a bottom, that was over 5 words long; A "word" measuring about 16 centimeters, said town wasn't happy about the water price inflation, and they secretly planned a retribution by kidnapping our fat cats trained to find water in their dreams only. Lazy cats. People discuss if saving them was really worth it since these lazy cats will eat ANYTHING but the giant rats! So I cooked the rats for dinner only to choke on bones. CPR saved our lives.

Cows.

Then I used the Bones to stick in the knee of the lazy fat cat who ate all my cabbages, all my pumpkins, watermelons and then was bloated and gassy Just like my uncle, Chippz who married  Sohler 50 years, at which point took everything out of the bathroom closet, and then hit  kevin007 on the toes. He cried alot but had to admit wholehearted that he loved to cry. So he smiled about it because his fetish was pain and the pain felt so much like daddy's spankings that he wet himself in joy, but then ThorFig fell off his own D-I-Y project that proceeded to explode immediately afterwards because he landed on the detonator, placed there by someone who was trying to hide it from The Crow who was trying to grief us because KillSkill loved Emery so much!!! But, LilMarie was lurking, hiding her panties from Azmael, who needed them for herald Contest rewards instead of hero days, who wore them for "protection" so the crow could not complain their livers were spoiled and get stomach ache. Unfortunately, he also liked to sing "It's raining men", match them with a bra, and made the men dance that contains massive amounts of cyanide. I started to think this story makes no sense but it is the reality that matters most but that's just about all of that during this nightly drinking party at the newly constructed Frat House. There are naked men dancing to a song that's called "Nelly, the pink elephant, packed fudge with the naked men over the exploding waving rainbow during spring break in greece when zombies invaded the coloseum." Lilyleaf623 banged Sellenka 96 (D100) times with a machete (broken) whilst Grungeking watched in awe while nomad099 sneakily stole his dried chewing gum shrine to taylork2 shaped like a zombie master

I'm not sure how many pages I should wait until I reupload the entire story, or if I should upload part of it from where we last were or all of it but I will upload all of it again because it has been a while and someone might come in late.


I woke up to the sound of the dripping water. I looked around, very slowly...and saw sniper28 running towards the toilet clutching his anus because he had eaten curry; the super deluxe special curry that the zombies made themselves using their own rotten limbs, torn off during Reaj 's attack in the town of London.

A hopskip and several flushes later, the curry attack has finally ended. But the relief was short-lived because I ate some chilli pepper. And that ended the story Of how I got explosive diarrhea on my twentieth birthday. In other news, the town my friend sniper28 was in started preparing for the coming depression, in which the price of water skyrocketed beyond belief, because some Griefer built the paper boat without a bottom, that was over 5 words long; A "word" measuring about 16 centimeters, said town wasn't happy about the water price inflation, and they secretly planned a retribution by kidnapping our fat cats trained to find water in their dreams only. Lazy cats. People discuss if saving them was really worth it since these lazy cats will eat ANYTHING but the giant rats! So I cooked the rats for dinner only to choke on bones. CPR saved our lives.

Cows.

Then I used the Bones to stick in the knee of the lazy fat cat who ate all my cabbages, all my pumpkins, watermelons and then was bloated and gassy Just like my uncle, Chippz who married Sohler 50 years, at which point took everything out of the bathroom closet, and then hit kevin007 on the toes. He cried alot but had to admit wholehearted that he loved to cry. So he smiled about it because his fetish was pain and the pain felt so much like daddy's spankings that he wet himself in joy, but then ThorFig fell off his own D-I-Y project that proceeded to explode immediately afterwards because he landed on the detonator, placed there by someone who was trying to hide it from The Crow who was trying to grief us because KillSkill loved Emery so much!!! But, LilMarie was lurking, hiding her panties from Azmael, who needed them for herald Contest rewards instead of hero days, who wore them for "protection" so the crow could not complain their livers were spoiled and get stomach ache. Unfortunately, he also liked to sing "It's raining men", match them with a bra, and made the men dance that contains massive amounts of cyanide. I started to think this story makes no sense but it is the reality that matters most but that's just about all of that during this nightly drinking party at the newly constructed Frat House. There are naked men dancing to a song that's called "Nelly, the pink elephant, packed fudge with the naked men over the exploding waving rainbow during spring break in greece when zombies invaded the coloseum." Lilyleaf623 banged Sellenka 96 (D100) times with a machete (broken) whilst Grungeking watched in awe while nomad099 sneakily stole his dried chewing gum shrine to taylork2 shaped like a zombie master mountains started to spout fire while the unladen swallows roared, farting in Romanboy 's general direction, while the diseased cows decided to dance all night whilst the zombies ate the children and Babane did not drink the blood of the innocent was spilt upon their graves. This, in turn, raised the number of attacking zombies considerably. But we had a minefield ready and Babane was not dehydrated, but he was meat lockered, so he wouldn't survive, unless he found a wishbone to offer The Crow in exchange for killing the entire human race.

Because of babanes drinking inability: "He has drinking problems, huh?", Airplane showed me how to be a real B.O.R.E at playing miniature golf. But I killed over there because they looked at me while I looked at Pablo playing with the BRD in the giant broken wheel that the hamster died in. We buried him very deep twenty kilometers away from the Shed of eternal itching and doom. Thank god for that penicillin

Story 2
From the ashes came Nemesis, wearing a pink tu-tu, the moon was rising again like a giant eye watching over the freshly destroyed town as the Fearless Fool emerged from the bloody smelly pool and glanced around at the remains of the prosthetic whale used in the construction of the great white flesheating moat. Exlz looked out over the moat where all the zombies melt.

Therdra was proud of the chicken that laid the golden door, which was used to access the Crow's forum nest holding all the strongest weapons. Including the nuke? That's not impossible. All zombies got nuked. It didnt kill the virus, instead, they became thermonuclear feathered statues who move when unseen. Luckily, The Doctor Crow arrived to remove the liver intact to transplant it with cows. Now they are placid chewers who enjoy cud and mahjong during the horrible nightly attacks.

On a completely different note, red uniforms are occasionally found on star trek extras. They die after running out of hero masks that they used to disguise as zombies, they decided to go out for picknick, but forgot to pack the chocolate salty balls Dasjoker made - he ate them all in rage - and then ragequit by eating himself with some ketchup sauce.

From the ashes came Nemesis, wearing a pink tu-tu, the moon was rising again like a giant eye watching over the freshly destroyed town as the Fearless Fool emerged from the bloody smelly pool and glanced around at the remains of the prosthetic whale used in the construction of the great white flesheating moat. Exlz looked out over the moat where all the zombies melt.

Therdra was proud of the chicken that laid the golden door, which was used to access the Crow's forum nest holding all the strongest weapons. Including the nuke? That's not impossible. All zombies got nuked. It didnt kill the virus, instead, they became thermonuclear feathered statues who move when unseen. Luckily, The Doctor Crow arrived to remove the liver intact to transplant it with cows. Now they are placid chewers who enjoy cud and mahjong during the horrible nightly attacks.

On a completely different note, red uniforms are occasionally found on star trek extras. They die after running out of hero masks that they used to disguise as zombies, they decided to go out for picknick, but forgot to pack the chocolate salty balls Dasjoker made - he ate them all in rage - and then ragequit by eating himself with some ketchup sauce.
